creator: Arittek
descriptionHtml: Befiler is Pakistan first online application for tax filing and online tax support while filing tax returns. The initiative aims to simplify the tax filing process for individuals; especially salaried class, and to promote the culture of documentation in Pakistan. Befiler makes tax filing easy for the common man who have little or no financial knowledge, without having need to engage expensive tax consultants.
descriptionShort: Pakistan's first online tax return preparation and filing services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Befiler is Pakistan's first initiative to facilitate tax return filing through a user friendly solution with the support of tax experts. All the tax returns are reviewed by tax consultant before submission in IRIS.

- Features
Tax Return Filing
NTN Verification
NTN Registration
Salary Calculator
Tax Return Calculator
Secure Online Payment Gateway
Notifications
We would like to improve & add-on more functions and features based on your suggestions, let us through "SUGGEST US" in Befiler app.

title: Befiler - Tax Return Filing & NTN Registration

creator: Arittek Solution (PVT) LTD
descriptionHtml:
Easily prepare and file your Income Tax Return & Register NTN.
Befiler has made tax filing easy for individuals to file their tax returns using their smartphones anywhere and anytime.

Why Befiler?
Befiler is easy and accurate, and does all the logical calculations itself which meet the FBR requirements. Befiler also provides online tax assistance if needed, through chat, call, and email.

One Fee for All “at the Best Value”
Our tax filing fee is Rs. 2,500 and Rs. 800 for NTN registration. There are no hidden charges no matter how complicated your tax return is.

Online Tax Expert Support
Our qualified tax consultants will guide and assist you through the entire filing process to make your journey very easy. Everyone gets free online chat, phone, and email support.

Every Case is Reviewed
Further, to ensure everything is in order, our tax experts will give a final review for any omissions before posting your case to IRIS-FBR.

Previous Tax Years (TY 2016 to Present Tax Year)
Befiler app enables you to file your returns for previous years as well, and build a profile for each year within the app.

Other Features
NTN Finder – will assist you to find your FBR registry details against your CNIC.
Salary Tax Calculator – helps you to calculate tax chargeable on your salary.

Data Privacy
Befiler keeps all your data private and confidential and does not share it with anybody for any purpose.
descriptionShort: Befiler Makes Income Tax Filing & NTN Registration Easy for Pakistanis.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW UPDATE INCLUDES FOLLOWING

Social Login for easy Sign-in & Sign-up
Update Tax Year 2021
More Interactive User Experience
New Income Categories (Freelancer, Pensioner, Trader & Shopkeeper, Wholesaler & Supplier, Importer & Exporter, Engineer, Doctor, Teacher, Consultant, and Etc.)
NTN Registration for Individual, Sole Proprietor, and AOP
IRIS Profile Update
Capital Gain Calculations
Salary Tax Calculator
NTN Status Finder
Enhances Data Security Controls

title: Befiler - Income Tax Filing & NTN Registration App

creator: Arittek Solution (PVT) LTD
descriptionHtml:
Easily prepare and file your Income Tax Return, Register NTN for Individual, Sole Proprietor, AOP, Update FBR Profile, NTN Status Finder, Salary Tax Calculator
.
Befiler has made tax filing easy for individuals to file their tax returns using their smartphones and tablets anywhere and anytime.

Why Befiler?
Befiler is easy and accurate and does all the logical calculations itself which meet the FBR requirements. Befiler also provides online tax assistance if needed, through chat, call, and email.

Previous Tax Years (TY 2016 to Present Tax Year)
Befiler app enables you to file your returns for previous years as well, and build a profile for each year within the app.

Other Features
Social Login - Now you can sign-up and sign-in with one click through Google and Facebook

NTN Finder – will assist you to find your FBR registry details against your CNIC.

Salary Tax Calculator – helps you to calculate tax chargeable on your salary.

FBR Profile Update - Befiler enables you to update your FBR profile so that can receive your refunds faster.

Data Privacy
Befiler keeps all your data private and confidential and does not share it with anybody for any purpose.

Capital Gain Calculations
Salary Tax Calculator
NTN Status Finder
Enhances Data Security Controls

title: Befiler - Income Tax Filing & NTN Registration App

creator: Arittek Solution (PVT) LTD
descriptionHtml:
Easily prepare and file your Income Tax Return, Register NTN for Individual, Sole Proprietor, AOP, Update FBR Profile, NTN Status Finder, Salary Tax Calculator
.
Befiler has made tax filing easy for individuals to file their tax returns using their smartphones and tablets anywhere and anytime.

Why Befiler?
Befiler is easy and accurate and does all the logical calculations itself which meet the FBR requirements. Befiler also provides online tax assistance if needed, through chat, call, and email.

One Fee for All “at the Best Value”
Our tax filing fee is Rs. 2,500 and Rs. 800 for NTN registration. There are no hidden charges no matter how complicated your tax return is.

Online Tax Expert Support
Our qualified tax consultants will guide and assist you through the entire filing process to make your journey very easy. Everyone gets free online chat, phone, and email support.

Every Case is Reviewed
Further, to ensure everything is in order, our tax experts will give a final review for any omissions before posting your case to IRIS-FBR.

Previous Tax Years (TY 2016 to Present Tax Year)
Befiler app enables you to file your returns for previous years as well, and build a profile for each year within the app.

Other Features
Social Login - Now you can sign-up and sign-in with one click through Google and Facebook

NTN Finder – will assist you to find your FBR registry details against your CNIC.

Salary Tax Calculator – helps you to calculate tax chargeable on your salary.

FBR Profile Update - Befiler enables you to update your FBR profile so that can receive your refunds faster.

Data Privacy
Befiler keeps all your data private and confidential and does not share it with anybody for any purpose.
descriptionShort: Befiler Makes Income Tax Filing & NTN Registration Easy for Pakistanis.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
ENTIRELY REVAMP APP WITH BUNDLE OF NEW FEATURES
Befiler has enhanced its UI/UX more colorful and intuitive for a better user experience.
Multi-profiling;
- With one login, the user can file his family tax returns and business tax filing
New services added which include;
- Company Tax Filing
- GST Registration
- USA Company registration & other
- ALT Finder
- Blogs & Videos
Expense Tracker;
- Now user can track his expense with Befiler Expense tracker (beta)
Live Chat and Push notification

title:
Befiler
1.0.40

creator: Arittek Solution (PVT) LTD
descriptionHtml:
Our services, including tax preparation, NTN registration, and other tax-related tasks, are provided with the explicit consent of the user, as mandated by law.

Why Choose Befiler?
Befiler makes tax filing easy, accurate, and stress-free. With automated calculations that meet FBR requirements, you can file your taxes confidently. Plus, you get access to online tax assistance via chat, call, and email whenever needed.

Transparent & Affordable Pricing:
Tax Filing Fee: Rs. 3,000
NTN Registration: Rs. 800
No hidden charges, no matter how complex your tax return is!

Expert Support at Every Step:
Our qualified tax consultants guide you through the filing process and provide free online support via chat, phone, and email. Every case is reviewed for accuracy before submission to IRIS-FBR.

File for Previous Tax Years:
With Befiler, you can file returns from TY 2016 to the present year. Build and manage your tax profiles year by year—seamlessly within the app.

Additional Features:
Social Login: One-click sign-up and login via Google or Facebook.
Salary Tax Calculator: Accurately calculate tax on your salary.

Your Privacy Matters
All data is kept confidential and is never shared with third parties for any purpose.

Simplify Tax Filing:
Prepare and file your income tax return, register NTN, update your FBR profile, and more—all through Befiler. Tax filing has never been easier, accessible anytime, anywhere, on your smartphone or tablet.

Disclaimer:
i, Befiler is not affiliated or partnered with the Federal Board of Revenue (FBR). Befiler does not require to be affiliated by law the of Pakistan to file tax returns or register individuals NTN on behalf of its clients by the law of Pakistan.
ii, Befiler is Securities and Exchange Commission of Pakistan (SECP) registered company, we operate in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
iv, All blogs published on the Befiler website (https://www.befiler.com/blog/) are available in our app. We source our information from a variety of reputable outlets—including local newspapers, official FBR publications, SECP releases, and more—to keep you informed about tax matters and legal updates.
v. Sources of information;
https://fbr.gov.pk/
https://www.secp.gov.pk/
descriptionShort: Befiler is One Stop for All Your Tax and Legal Worries.
